document_data.caption2: The Cliffwatch depicted on maps of various eras
document_data.name: Cliffwatch
document_data.refs: {{Cite web/theedverse/2021-11-14 - Some Unlabeled North Ward Roads}}
document_data.mainbody: The '''Cliffwatch''' was a public walkway in the [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]] that partially spanned the length of the edge of the steep [[Cliffwatch (cliff)|cliff of the same name]]. The southernmost portion of this road was also referred to as the '''Watchway'''.<ref>
document_data.Description: There were no rails or walls separating this walkway from the steep {{SI|100|ft|long=yes}} drop of the Cliffwatch.<ref>
document_data.Location: This street stretched from north to south, running parallel to [[Saerdoun Street]] and [[Zendulth Street]] — as well as meeting the two of them at an intersection — until terminating alongside [[Malkur's Ride]] at the [[Beaconmarch]], right before the [[Watchway Tower]].
document_data.Reputation: This walkway provided pedestrians an ample view over the Cliffwatch,
